text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/077b9dd3541339a23ade0cc6a23e804ee39312c5|patch 8.1.2312: "line:" field in tags file not used>
patch 8.1.2312: "line:" field in tags file not used

Problem:    "line:" field in tags file not used.
Solution:   Recognize the field and use the value. (Andy Massimino, Daniel
            Hahler, closes #5232, closes #2546, closes #1057)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2312: "line:" field in tags file not used · vim/vim@077b9dd

attachments.text: Problem: "line:" field in tags file not used. Solution: Recognize the field and use the value. (Andy Massimino, Daniel Hahler, closes #5232, closes #2546, closes #1057)

text:

patch 8.1.2313: debugging where a delay comes from is not easy

Problem:    Debugging where a delay comes from is not easy.
Solution:   Use different values when calling ui_delay().

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2313: debugging where a delay comes from is not easy · vim/vim@eda1da0
attachments.text: Problem: Debugging where a delay comes from is not easy. Solution: Use different values when calling ui_delay().

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7170b295b06e3168424985530d8477ed2e058b67|patch 8.1.2314: vi' sometimes does not select anything>
patch 8.1.2314: vi' sometimes does not select anything

Problem:    vi' sometimes does not select anything.
Solution:   Recognize an empty selection. (Christian Brabandt, closes #5183)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2314: vi' sometimes does not select anything · vim/vim@7170b29
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2314: vi' sometimes does not select anything · vim/vim@7170b29
attachments.text: Problem: vi' sometimes does not select anything. Solution: Recognize an empty selection. (Christian Brabandt, closes #5183)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/539aa6b25eaea91dfd1a175cd053c0f259fa2e58|patch 8.1.2315: not always using the right window when jumping to an …>
patch 8.1.2315: not always using the right window when jumping to an error

Problem:    Not always using the right window when jumping to an error.
Solution:   Add the "uselast" flag in 'switchbuf'. (closes #1652)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2315: not always using the right window when jumping to an … · vim/vim@539aa6b
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2315: not always using the right window when jumping to an … · vim/vim@539aa6b
attachments.text: …error Problem: Not always using the right window when jumping to an error. Solution: Add the "uselast" flag in 'switchbuf'. (closes #1652)

patch 8.1.2316: FORTIFY_SOURCE can also be present in CPPFLAGS

Problem:    FORTIFY_SOURCE can also be present in CPPFLAGS.
Solution:   Remove it in configure. (Benedikt Morbach, closes #2786)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5f763348186007e91932f5134da8dbd0d3bffb11|patch 8.1.2318: MS-Windows GUI: main background shows in toolbar>
patch 8.1.2318: MS-Windows GUI: main background shows in toolbar

Problem:    MS-Windows GUI: main background shows in toolbar.
Solution:   Remove transparency from the toolbar. (Simon Sadler)

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2318: MS-Windows GUI: main background shows in toolbar · vim/vim@5f76334
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows GUI: main background shows in toolbar. Solution: Remove transparency from the toolbar. (Simon Sadler)
